Body:
"""
        Test that an access check using a policy that does not support the
        specified operation is handled correctly.
        """
e = engine.KmipEngine()
e._logger = mock.Mock()
e._get_enum_string = mock.Mock(side_effect=['Create', 'SymmetricKey'])
e.get_relevant_policy_section = mock.Mock(return_value={enums.ObjectType.
    SYMMETRIC_KEY: {enums.Operation.GET: enums.Policy.ALLOW_OWNER}})
result = e.is_allowed('test_policy', 'test_user', 'test_group', 'test_user',
    enums.ObjectType.SYMMETRIC_KEY, enums.Operation.CREATE)
e._logger.warning.assert_called_once_with(
    "The 'test_policy' policy does not apply to Create operations on SymmetricKey objects."
    )
self.assertFalse(result)
